Gus: So I should forgive and just forget it?
Dinah: Yeah. You forgive anyway. That's the deal.

Dinah: Look, harley and mallet, did they sleep together? Yeah, they did. All 
right. Will... will it make things worse when you look at the fact that, you 
know, I don't know, they fell in love years ago and they were an item? Yeah, it
